var preorderTraversal = function (root) {
  let result = []

  const traversing = (node) => {
    // ç»“æŸé€’å½’
    if (!node) return []

    // é¦–å…ˆéå†å½“å‰çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
    result.push(node.val)
    // å¦‚æœæœ‰å·¦å­æ ‘ä¼˜å…ˆéå†å·¦å­æ ‘
    if (node.left) {
      result.concat(traversing(node.left))
    }
    // éå†åˆå­æ ‘
    if (node.right) {
      result.concat(traversing(node.right))
    }
  }

  traversing(root)

  return result
}

var inorderTraversal = function (root) {
  let result = []
  const traversing = (node) => {
    if (!node) return
    // ä¼˜å…ˆéå†å·¦å­æ ‘
    if (node.left) {

    }
    // ç„¶åè·å–å½“å‰çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
    if (node.val) {
      result.push(node.val)
    }
    // ç„¶åéå†å³å­æ ‘
    if (node.right) {
      traversing(node.right)
    }
  }
  traversing(root)

var postorderTraversal = function (root) {
  let result = []
  const traversing = (node) => {
    if (!node) return
    if (node.left) {
      traversing(node.left)
    }
    if (node.right) {
      traversing(node.right)
    }
    if (node.val) {
      result.push(node.val)
    }
  }
  traversing(root)
  return result
};

å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¹¿æ³›è¿ç”¨åœ¨æ ‘æˆ–å›¾è¿™ç±»æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ä¸­ï¼Œéå†æˆ–æœç´¢çš„ç®—æ³•ã€‚è¯¥ç®—æ³•ä»ä¸€ä¸ªæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€å§‹ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆè®¿é—®èŠ‚ç‚¹æœ¬èº«ã€‚ç„¶åä¾æ¬¡éå†å®ƒçš„äºŒçº§é‚»èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€ä¸‰çº§é‚»èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œä»¥æ­¤ç±»æ¨ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬è¿™é‡Œä¾ç„¶ä½¿ç”¨é€’å½’éå†, ä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨é€’å½’ä¸­æ·»åŠ levelå‚æ•°ç”¨æ¥ç¡®å®šå½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å±‚çº§ã€‚


var levelOrder = function (root) {
  let result = []

  const traversing = (node, level) => {
    if (!node) return
    if (!result[level]) result[level] = []
    result[level].push(node.val)
    if (node.left) {
      traversing(node.left, level + 1)
    }
    if (node.right) {
      traversing(node.right, level + 1)
    }
  }

  traversing(root, 0)
  return result
}

var maxDepth = function(root) {
  if (!root) return 0

  const traversing = (node) => {
    if (!node) return

    if (!node.left && !node.right) {
      node.depth = 1
      return
    }
    if (node.left) {
      traversing(node.left)
    }
    if (node.right) {
      traversing(node.right)  
    }
    let max_left_depth = 0
    let max_right_depth = 0

    if (node.left) {
      max_left_depth = node.left.depth
    }
    if (node.right) {
      max_right_depth = node.right.depth
    }

    node.depth = Math.max(max_left_depth, max_right_depth) + 1
  }

  traversing(root)

  return root.depth
}

var isSymmetric = function(root) {
  // BFSéå†
  let result = []
  const traversing = (node, level) => {

    }

    } else {
      traversing(null, level + 1)  
    }
      
    if (node.right) {
      traversing(node.right, level + 1)
    } else {
      traversing(null, level + 1) 
    }
      
  }

  // åˆ¤æ–­æ¯ä¸€çº§çš„ç»“æœèƒ½å¦æ„æˆå›æ–‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
  for (let i = 0; i < result.length - 1; i++) {
    if (result[i].join('') !== result[i].reverse().join('')) {
      return false
    }
  }
  return true
};

var hasPathSum = function(root, sum) {
  let result = []
  const traversing = (root, sum) => { 
      
    if (!root) return false
    
    // è¯´æ˜æ‹¥æœ‰è·¯å¾„ç­‰äºç›®æ ‡çš„å’Œ
    if (!root.left && !root.right && root.val === sum) {
        result.push(root.val)
    }
    
    if (root.left) {
        traversing(root.left, sum - root.val) 
    }
    
    if (root.right) {
        traversing(root.right, sum - root.val)
    } 
  }
   
  traversing(root, sum)

  return result.length > 0
};

var buildTree = function(inorder, postorder) {
    let binaryTree = {}
   
  const iteration = (postorder, inorder, tree) => {
       
      if (!postorder.length) {
          binaryTree = null
          return
      }
       
      tree.val = null
      tree.left = {
          val: null,
          left: null,
          right: null
      }
      tree.right = {
          val: null,
          left: null,
          right: null
      }

     // å‰åºéå†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºå½“å‰æ ‘çš„æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹
     let rootVal = postorder.splice(postorder.length - 1, 1)[0]
     // ä¸­åºéå†æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç´¢å¼•
     let rootIndex = inorder.indexOf(rootVal)
     // ä¸­åºéå†çš„å·¦å­æ ‘
     let inorderLeftTree = inorder.slice(0, rootIndex)
     // ä¸­åºéå†çš„å³å­æ ‘
     let inorderRightTree = inorder.slice(rootIndex + 1)
     // å‰åºéå†çš„å·¦å­æ ‘
     let postorderLeftTree = postorder.slice(0, inorderLeftTree.length)
     // å‰åºéå†çš„å³å­æ ‘
     let postorderRightTree = postorder.slice(inorderLeftTree.length)

       
     tree.val = rootVal
      
     if (postorderLeftTree.length === 1 || inorderLeftTree.length === 1) {
         tree.left.val = postorderLeftTree[0]
     } else if (postorderLeftTree.length > 1 || inorderLeftTree.length > 1) {
         iteration(postorderLeftTree, inorderLeftTree, tree.left)
     } else {
          tree.left = null
     }
       
     if (postorderRightTree.length === 1 || inorderRightTree.length === 1) {
         tree.right.val = postorderRightTree[0]
     } else if (postorderRightTree.length > 1 || inorderRightTree.length > 1) {
         iteration(postorderRightTree, inorderRightTree, tree.right)
     } else {
      tree.right = null
     }
  }
   
  iteration(postorder, inorder, binaryTree)
   
  return binaryTree
}

var isValidBST = function(root) {

    // ä¸­åºDFS
    let result = []

           iteration(root.left)

};

var searchBST = function(root, val) {
    if (!root) return null
    
    let result = null
    
    const seatch = (node) => {
        if (node.val === val) {
            return result = node
        } else if (val > node.val && node.right) {
            seatch(node.right)
        } else if (val < node.val && node.left) {
            seatch(node.left)
        }
    }
    
    seatch(root)
        
    return result
};

var lowestCommonAncestor = function(root, p, q) {
    if (root.val > p.val && root.val > q.val) {
        return lowestCommonAncestor(root.left, p, q)

    if (root.val < p.val && root.val < q.val) {

    }
    return root
};

var replaceWords = function(dict, sentence) {
    let sentences = sentence.split(' ')

const { Nuxt, Builder } = require("nuxt");
let config = require("../../nuxt.config");
module.exports = (options, app) => {
  const nuxtRender = new Nuxt(config);
  let isDev = process.env.NODE_ENV !== "production";
  if (isDev) {
    new Builder(nuxtRender).build();
  }
  return async function(ctx, next) {
    let flag = false;
    let routerArr = [];
    if (!flag) {
      routerArr = app.router.stack.map(el => el.path);
      flag = true;
    }
    if (routerArr.some(el => el === ctx.path)) {
      return await next();
    }
    ctx.status = 200;
    ctx.req.session = ctx.session;
    const { res, req } = ctx;
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      ctx.res.on("close", resolve);
      ctx.res.on("finish", resolve);
      nuxtRender.render(req, res, promise => {
        promise.then(resolve).catch(reject);
      });
    });
  };
};
